t: Tips for Using Amazon Stickers and Labels in RestockPro
s: Brand your shipments with your store name so they are easily recognized. Include expiration dates if desired. Add any other information you routinely want to include on stickers so that you don't have to type it into custom text every time you print stickers.

t: Can I add a sticker with a link to my website on products that I sell on Amazon using FBA? The brand is not my own, there are many sellers selling the brand. - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 2): Hi Aaron, adding a sticker with a link to your website on products (not yours) that you sell on Amazon using FBA would violate their rules and could result in account suspension or termination.
